issue.title: [C++] Add arrow::schema factory function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1336](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1336). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because using `std::make_shared` with initializer lists is incompatible, it would be useful to have a factory function for making schemas from an initializer list of fields to make user syntax nicer
